resources.string: This application aims to help you importing/exporting your MMSes and/or SMSes into/from your android phone.
To begin, click on import and select your .tar file, or click on export and choose the output location.

To do so, if you own a nokia N900, it is recommended to use my other application available @ https://github.com/axelhenry/msmsexporter-n900.\n However, as long as your .tar file complies with the specifications available @ https://github.com/axelhenry/msmsimporter-archive , the importation process should work.
An exception occurred during processing, sorry for the inconvenience.
Export to compressed archive, should save about 10% space.
Include debug files when exporting, useful if you\'re encountering errors.

Let you choose which charset this application will use to import/export messages. By default, locale charset will be used. However, if some characters are badly displayed, feel free to try one of the others available charsets.
